## Enhancements made

- ü§ñ Update our TS config and bundler versions [#2499](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2499) ([`@agoose77`](https://github.com/agoose77), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))
- ü§ñ Store execution outputs in `Outputs` [#1903](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/1903) ([`@agoose77`](https://github.com/agoose77), [`@stevejpurves`](https://github.com/stevejpurves), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@fwkoch`](https://github.com/fwkoch), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))

## Bugs fixed

- üêõ Latex tables without containers [#2536](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2536) ([`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))
- üêõ Do not raise errors on non-accessible sub-trees [#2532](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2532) ([`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))

## Maintenance and upkeep improvements

- üêõ Incorrect type import [#2541](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2541) ([`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))
- üì¶ Packaging updates [#2539](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2539) ([`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))

## Documentation improvements

- üìñ Fix typo in GitHub Pages documentation [#2550](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2550) ([`@asjohnston`-asf](https://github.com/asjohnston-asf), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))
